svg.text: Execute long-running tasks with live updates

text.font-family: Inter, "SF Pro", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

svg.text: This page demonstrates lofigui's controller pattern for managing long-running

text.font-family: Inter, "SF Pro", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

svg.text: The controller tracks the process state

text.font-family: Inter, "SF Pro", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

svg.text: The page automatically refreshes to show progress

text.font-family: Inter, "SF Pro", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

svg.text: The status panel updates in real-time

text.font-family: Inter, "SF Pro", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

svg.text: You can cancel the process at any time
